result.reason: Combining the filter and connect fields would sacrifice discoverability and usability — the two fields serve distinct UX purposes (filtering the tree vs. initiating a connection) and merging them would require complex disambiguation logic with unclear benefit over the current two-field design.
result.approach: Would require a unified input that toggles between filter and connect mode, similar to a browser address bar — significant UX redesign with high risk of regression; better addressed by improving discoverability of existing fields.
